name: Box Reloaded
overview: Pancho Tuercas is the maintenance manager of a large manufacturer of household products. His boss has asked him to increase production, to build a computerized control center to be able to manage the entire manufacturing process from there. For this, Pancho must find the 9 parts that make up the control center and that are scattered around the most remote corners of the factory. In addition, Pancho's boss is a very orderly guy and has demanded that he collect all the articles he finds lying around the various rooms of the warehouse before he can go to another room. Would you like to give him a hand?
